column1:
>>> class C(object):
        def __init__(self):
            self._x = None
        @property
        def x(self):
            """"""I'm the 'x' property.""""""
            return self._x
        @x.setter
        def x(self, value):
            self._x = value
        @x.deleter
        def x(self):
            del self._x
